Package org.example.service.implementation

Class HODServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
org.example.service.implementation.HODServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
AccountService<HOD>, EmployeeService<HOD>, HODService
public class HODServiceImpl extends Object implements HODService

Class HODServiceImpl

This is a HODService implementation which also extends AccountServiceImpl.

  • Method Details

    • getAccountDetails

      public Account getAccountDetails(String email, String password) throws NotFoundException, AuthenticationException, AuthorizationException
      Description copied from interface: AccountService
      Gets the details of the account with the associated employee. The FetchType.LAZY fields in the children of employee don't get set to null as it's the responsibility of the implementing class.
      Specified by:
      getAccountDetails in interface AccountService<HOD>
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the account. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it's null.
      password - The password of the account. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it's null.
      Returns:
      The details of the Account.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - If the account does not exist.
      AuthenticationException - If the user is not authenticated.
      AuthorizationException - If the user is not authorized to do the task.

    • createAccount

      public void createAccount(String email, String forename, String surname, List<Address> addresses, List<Phone> phones, String password) throws AuthorizationException, AlreadyExistException
      Description copied from interface: AccountService
      Creates a new account.
      Specified by:
      createAccount in interface AccountService<HOD>
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the account. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it's null.
      forename - The forename of the account. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it's null.
      surname - The surname of the account. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it's null.
      addresses - The addresses of the account. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it's null or empty.
      phones - The phones of the account. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it's null or empty.
      password - The password of the account. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it's null.
      Throws:
      AuthorizationException - If the user is not authorized to do the task.
      AlreadyExistException - If the account already exists.

    • getComplaint

      public Complaint getComplaint(String email, String password, int complaintId) throws AuthenticationException, AuthorizationException, NotFoundException
      Description copied from interface: HODService
      Returns a complaint with the given id. All the FetchType.LAZY fields are set to null.
      Specified by:
      getComplaint in interface HODService
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the HOD. Throws IllegalArgumentException it is null.
      password - The password of the HOD. Throws IllegalArgumentException it is null.
      complaintId - The id of the complaint.
      Returns:
      The Complaint
      Throws:
      AuthenticationException - If the HOD is not authenticated.
      AuthorizationException - If the HOD is not authorized.
      NotFoundException - If the HOD or complaint is not found

      Description copied from interface: HODService

      Specified by:

      password - The password of the HOD. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it is null

      A List of all Complaints assigned to the employee
      Throws:

    • assignExistingComplainToExistingEngineer

      public void assignExistingComplainToExistingEngineer(String email, String password, int complaintId, String engineerEmail) throws AuthenticationException, AuthorizationException, NotFoundException, AlreadyExistException
      Description copied from interface: HODService
      Assign an existing complaint to an existing employee
      Specified by:
      assignExistingComplainToExistingEngineer in interface HODService
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the HOD. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it is null
      password - The password of the HOD. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it is null
      complaintId - The id of the complaint.
      engineerEmail - The email of the employee. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it is null
      Throws:
      AuthenticationException - If the email or password is incorrect
      AuthorizationException - If the HOD is not authorized to do the task.
      NotFoundException - If the HOD, complaint or employee is not found.
      AlreadyExistException - If the employee is already assigned to the complaint

    • removeExistingComplainFromExistingEngineer

      public void removeExistingComplainFromExistingEngineer(String email, String password, int complaintId, String engineerEmail) throws AuthenticationException, NotFoundException, AuthorizationException
      Description copied from interface: HODService
      Removes an existing complaint from an existing employee
      Specified by:
      removeExistingComplainFromExistingEngineer in interface HODService
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the HOD. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it is null
      password - The password of the HOD. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it is null
      complaintId - The id of the complaint.
      engineerEmail - The email of the employee. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it is null
      Throws:
      AuthenticationException - If the email or password is incorrect
      NotFoundException - If the HOD, complaint or employee is not found or the complaint is not assigned to the employee
      AuthorizationException - If the HOD is not authorized to do the task.

    • createEngineerAccount

      public void createEngineerAccount(String email, String password, String engineerEmail, String engineerForename, String engineerSurname, List<Address> addresses, List<Phone> phones, String engineerPassword) throws AuthenticationException, AuthorizationException, NotFoundException, AlreadyExistException
      Description copied from interface: HODService
      Creates an employee account
      Specified by:
      createEngineerAccount in interface HODService
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the HOD. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it is null
      password - The password of the HOD. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it is null
      engineerEmail - The email of the employee. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it is null
      engineerForename - The forename of the employee. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it is null
      engineerSurname - The surname of the employee. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it is null
      addresses - The list of address, of the employee. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it is null
      phones - The list of phones, of the employee. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it is null
      engineerPassword - The password for the employee. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it is null
      Throws:
      AuthenticationException - If the HOD email or password is incorrect
      AuthorizationException - If the HOD is not authorized to do the task.
      NotFoundException - If the HOD is not found
      AlreadyExistException - If the employee account already exists
